lines.text: Oh, the Air Force gets the glory and the Navy gets the cheers, but all the dogface ever gets is mud behind the ears.
Yeah, the tank boys ride in comfort and a sailor takes a sail, but the dogface never gets a chance to sit down on his tail.
[singing to the tune of Inky-Dinky Parlez-Vous]
All the roads are pretty rough, parlez-vous.
And all the services are pretty tough, parlez-vous.
So whether you fight as soldier or gob / Get in there and pitch and finish the job / inky-dinky parlez-vous
